name: 拯救大魔王重生 Falsemen: Demon Rebirth
description: Humanity has become the dominant force in the world, and the devils are living under the cover of their names... Are you really willing? The world is being dominated by evil human beings!
minimum_requirements: 最低配置: 操作系统: windows7 处理器: Core i3 内存: 4 GB RAM 图形: any type 存储空间: 需要 500 MB 可用空间 声卡: any type
recommended_requirements: 推荐配置: 操作系统: windows 10 处理器: Core i5 内存: 8 GB RAM 图形: The more expensive type would certainly be better. 存储空间: 需要 1 GB 可用空间 声卡: The more expensive type would certainly be better.
